import React from 'react' import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import { useFormik } from 'formik' function Login() { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { email: '', password: '', }, onSubmit: values => { console.log(values) } }) return (

Login

) } export default Login
